SEARCH
Module AM25_myShelfie
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Interface SceneState

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphicalUI
public interface SceneState
Interfaces implemented by GraphicalUI used by SceneFactories to call changes to current factory instance.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final AtomicBoolean
    isDisconnecting
    AtomicBoolean used to prevent false alerts over dying client connections

      Parameters:

    • update

      void update()
      Method to cycle to next scenefactory, invoked from scene or SceneState itself. This method will call the next() method of the current instance of SceneFactory and will substitute the current factory with the result of the previous call of next(); then it will set the stage current scene with the result of the getter for the scene of the new factory

    • forceUpdate

      void forceUpdate(SceneFactory factory)
      Method to force the update to a certain Screen, SceneFactory is chosen
      Parameters:
      factory - new factory
